subject: Soccer
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Adriana Leon scored in the 63rd minute and Notre Dame defeated Stanford, 1-0, in Cary, N.C., to win its third N.C.A.A. Women’s College Cup championship.
snippet: Adriana Leon scored in the 63rd minute and Notre Dame defeated Stanford, 1-0, in Cary, N.C., to win its third N.C.A.A. Women’s College Cup championship.
